items.title: Create your First Computer Game with Stencyl

visible_instructors.title: Richard Sneyd
visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Design Lecturer, Founder & CEO of CyberMyth Games

items.headline: With no previous programming or game design experience, build your own amazing 2D games in just a matter of hours!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be capable of creating your own 2D games
You will learn to build logic in a visual interface, skills which are transferable to traditional programming if & when you choose to take that step
You will learn to create your own sprites with Photoshop

items.title: Business Intelligence Solutions with Qlik Sense
items.headline: Learn Qlik Sense data visualization and analyze data easily and make faster business decisions
objectives_summary: Develop an intuitive and informative dashboard with the appropriate depth of interactivity using Qlik Sense.
Display data in maps, charts, and text across multiple sheets.
Apply set analysis to your data in Qlik Sense expressions.

items.title: Unity 5 Level Design, Lighting, and Animation
items.headline: Learn the principles of level design, lightning and animation in Unity 5
objectives_summary: Get a better understanding of how level design works
Have all the tools you need to continue with the game and make it your own
Explore material creation with Unity 5

items.title: Create a Point & Click Adventure using Unity
items.headline: Create your own 90's Adventure Point & Click Game with Unity & C#
objectives_summary: Create a complete Point & Click Adventure game similar to Monkey Island, Days of the Tentacle and other point click games
Editor Scripting to ease game play development
Object Oriented Programming

items.title: Introduction to Unity 3D Scripting
items.headline: Learn the basics of coding video games with Unity 3D.
objectives_summary: Learn basic game coding techniques

items.title: Create HTML5 Games Using Adobe Animate
items.headline: Make resolution independent HTML5 games using Adobe Animate CC
objectives_summary: Create great looking games that do not lose any crispness if taken from mobile phone size to large screen TV.
Learn how to draw with Adobe Animate.
Learn how to animate with Adobe Animate.

items.headline: You will learn how to create Facebook instant games from zero to hero. Take profit of this newly released platform.
objectives_summary: A student after he completes the course he will have full understanding of the platform and a template game that he can insert into its own games and be able to put thier game live

objectives_summary: Learn Intermediate Scripting
Learn Advanced Scripting
Program And Solve Complicated Problems Using C#

items.title: Unity 2019 Make an intermediate 3d survival game
items.headline: Create a 3d game with URP from scratch in a low poly style with inventory, crafting and save systems.
objectives_summary: Unity game development using Universal Rendering Pipeline
Implementing different game systems: movement, cinemachine camera, inventory, pickup, crafting and saving game.
Creating a low-poly map using 3d models and PolyBrush tool

items.title: Learn Unity Shaders from Scratch
items.headline: A complete guide to Unity ShaderLab and the HLSL Shading Language
objectives_summary: The mysteries of writing Unity shaders
You will be gently introduced to how to approach the problem of creating a custom shader.
You will learn the full details of the Cg shader language.

Understand the very basics of UVW Unwrapping for 3d
Learn the basic, core UI of the UVW Editor in 3ds Max

Develop a simple multi-platform controller to control a spaceship with both a keyboard and a touch device.
Build visible game level components with gismos.

items.title: JavaScript HTML Game from Scratch Blackjack

Create a Blackjack game from scratch
Apply logic and build a web based game using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
